extendedInfo.description: FingerPen coloring book is an exciting, educational application for children.  It invites children to draw & color a wide variety of animals, landscapes, digits, numbers and much more. Your child has the possibility to express themselves creatively and become familiar with a full pallet of colors. This application is visually arresting and intuitive which creates the perfect educational platform for children.The application is divided into several coloring-in categories and progressive levels of difficulty. Children and/or parents can share their personalized paintings via email and facebook or simply store them in their own gallery. FEATURES* Realistic finger painting that requires precision and practice. * Develops fine motor skills and creativity.* 7 drawing categories: for boys, for girls, for kids. animals, number & letters, shapes and pot luck.* Coloring-in animals with sounds!* Free version contains over 17 illustrations as free samples and pot luck * Full version contains over 200 unique illustrations carefully selected by our design department* Engaging, age-appropriate and skill-appropriate topics* Store completed drawings in the app gallery or share them via email and facebook.* HD device friendly - the app adjusts to screen sizes of all cellphones and tablet devices* Free updatesBecome a fan of FingerPen on facebook:http://www.facebook.com/ITSS.GamesFollow us on twitter:http://twitter.com/ITSS.GamesKeywords: coloring book, kids, fun, child, children, baby, game, animals, coloring, colors, toddler, preschool, kindergarten, education, baby toys, kids toys, children's book, baby books, coloring games, coloring book, gifted education, infant, newborn, painting, sketch, picture games, coloring materials, paint, figure study.

reviews.title: Blank page
reviews.comment: Page is chosen, you see image for about a second then it disappears. Color doesn\'t even show as you try to paint. As you exit you see the the image again with color you were trying to paint.
reviews.author: Veronica Rodriguez

reviews.title: Simple to use
reviews.comment: My 4 almost 5 yr old loves this app especially since she can save her drawings and share them. It is very easy to use. She just loves it.
reviews.author: Deanna Fileccia

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: It\'s simple & funny for my 2-years old daughter.
reviews.author: Santi Amelia

reviews.title: Just great!
reviews.comment: Best coloring book I\'ve seen so far. Simple and it\'s a real coloring book not \"a fill color\" app.
reviews.author: Ralph Lorenc

reviews.title: Good game!
reviews.comment: Good game I have recently downloaded colouring book for my younger cousin, she really enjoys this game, as it has endless amounts of fun (and hours too) love this game!!!
reviews.author: Tomasz Paj\304\205k
